exclusion.criterion: Severe or life threatening COVID infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Glomerular filtration rate (GFR) < 30 ml/min by CKD-EPI equation

notes: The patient has high blood pressure and signs of septicemia, but no severe or life-threatening COVID infection. He is not pregnant or lactating, and there is no indication of participation in any investigational clinical study.
